amendment.description: To require a report on actions to reduce the consumption of petroleum-based fuel by the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4359 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4359 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6122) To require a report on actions to reduce the consumption of petroleum-based fuel by the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4359 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4359 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
